name: Lifeceyecle
overview:
Imagine how effectively you could manage your company’s production if we could automate order processing and time & action tracking?

Lifeceyecle is a collaborative production management application that enables employees, suppliers and clients to efficiently manage and monitor their entire production cycle.

Your clients can login through a computer or mobile device from anywhere at any time and monitor the status of their orders. Your supply chain can update their responsibilities in real time, and your company can manage the production workflow from prototype to final delivery.

In a global marketplace the common thread is the movement of goods. From raw materials to finished product, manufactured or out-sourced, companies need to keep track of their products at all times.

Simplify the integration and automation of the production work flow critical in the movement and tracking of materials from initial prototype to final product.

Combine the knowledge of product development with the power of sales order management to create a system that streamlines raw materials, production, inventory and time and action tracking. The application automates raw material and product order requirements and the associated workflow time & action tracking.

http://www.lifeceyecle.com
